traitGlossary.low_cit_for_smes: Comparatively lower effective corporate income tax for smaller, domestic-focused companies (illustrative).
traitGlossary.tax_deferral_retained_profits: Tax generally due upon distribution, helping reinvestment (illustrative).
traitGlossary.innovation_box_like: Preferential regime for certain IP/innovation income (illustrative).
traitGlossary.imputation_system_like: Shareholder-level relief mechanisms that may reduce double taxation (illustrative).
traitGlossary.r_and_d_incentives: Credits or super-deductions to encourage research and development.
traitGlossary.ip_box_like: Preferential treatment for qualifying IP income.
traitGlossary.treaty_network: Broad tax treaty coverage can reduce withholding and double taxation.
traitGlossary.startup_friendly: Incorporation, visas, grants, or simplified regimes attractive to startups.
traitGlossary.sme_friendly: Administrative and tax features that can benefit smaller companies.
traitGlossary.remote_worker_friendly: Frameworks or policies that may be favorable to distributed teams.
traitGlossary.no_withholding_dividends_intra_eu_like: Mechanisms that may reduce intra-EU dividend withholding in group structures (subject to rules).
traitGlossary.strong_ip_regime: Robust intellectual property protection and enforcement frameworks.
traitGlossary.english_language: English as widely spoken business language, reducing operational friction.
traitGlossary.hub_for_saas: Established ecosystems and infrastructure supporting software-as-a-service businesses.
traitGlossary.good_treaty_network: Comprehensive network of tax treaties facilitating cross-border business.
traitGlossary.digital_admin_ease: Streamlined digital processes for business administration and compliance.
traitGlossary.fast_incorporation: Rapid and efficient business incorporation procedures.
traitGlossary.holding_company_friendly: Favorable regimes for holding company structures and group financing.
traitGlossary.logistics_hub: Strategic location and infrastructure for European distribution and logistics.
traitGlossary.finance_friendly: Regulatory and tax environment supportive of financial services.
traitGlossary.ip_friendly: General intellectual property advantages and supportive ecosystem.
traitGlossary.loss_carryforward_depth: Generous provisions for carrying forward business losses.
traitGlossary.manufacturing_ecosystem: Strong industrial base and manufacturing support infrastructure.
traitGlossary.large_market: Significant domestic market providing scale opportunities.
traitGlossary.strong_r_and_d_credit: Substantial research and development tax credits and incentives.
traitGlossary.deep_talent_pool: Access to skilled workforce and specialized expertise.
traitGlossary.startup_visas: Immigration pathways designed to attract international entrepreneurs.
traitGlossary.startup_law_like: Legislative frameworks specifically designed to support startup growth.
traitGlossary.tech_ecosystem_growing: Emerging and expanding technology sector with government support.
traitGlossary.fintech_friendly: Regulatory sandbox and supportive environment for financial technology.
traitGlossary.startup_ecosystem: Established network of startups, investors, and support organizations.
traitGlossary.strong_ip_protection: Robust legal framework for intellectual property rights enforcement.
traitGlossary.deep_tech_talent: Access to highly specialized technical and engineering expertise.
traitGlossary.robust_r_and_d_deduction: Comprehensive tax deductions for research and development expenditure.
traitGlossary.design_hardware_ecosystem: Industrial design and hardware development capabilities.
traitGlossary.sme_support_programs: Government programs and incentives specifically targeting small and medium enterprises.
